changeSet.sql: insert into scheduler(group_name,name,exchange,data,schedule,force_disabled,enabled) values ('init','001.ping','otp-etl.scheduler','{"data": "ping for init testing...", "action": "ping", "exchange": "otp-etl.scheduler"}',null,false,true), ('init','zzz.switch','otp-etl.scheduler','{"group": "test", "action": "switch"}',null,false,true), ('test','001.govua_10', 'otp-etl.downloader','{"ident": "govua10_t", "attemptsLeft": 3}','{"start": "2021-01-01T00:00", "minutes": {"type": "periodic", "value": 2}}',false,false), ('collect','001.govua_1','otp-etl.downloader','{"ident": "govua1", "attemptsLeft": 3}','{"start": "2021-01-01T00:00", "minutes": {"type": "periodic", "value": 3}}',false,false), ('collect','002.govua_2','otp-etl.downloader','{"ident": "govua2", "attemptsLeft": 3}','{"start": "2021-01-01T00:00", "minutes": {"type": "periodic", "value": 3}}',false,false), ('collect','003.govua17','otp-etl.downloader','{"ident": "govua17", "attemptsLeft": 3}','{"start": "2021-01-01T00:00", "minutes": {"type": "periodic", "value": 3}}',false,false), ('test','002.govua_17','otp-etl.downloader','{"ident": "govua_17", "attemptsLeft": 3}','{"start": "2021-01-01T00:00", "minutes": {"type": "periodic", "value": 2}}',true,false)
